verses.verse: "For the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G3617>landowner<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G260>early<s%> in the <S%G4404>morning<s%> to <S%G3409>hire<s%> <S%G2040>laborers<s%> for his <S%G290>vineyard.<s%>
"And when he had <S%G4856>agreed<s%> with the <S%G2040>laborers<s%> for a <S%G1220>denarius<s%> for the <S%G2250>day,<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> them into his <S%G290>vineyard.<s%>

"And he <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> and <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G692>idle<s%> in the <S%G58>market<s%> <S%G58>place;<s%>

and to <S%G1565>those<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'You <S%G2532>too<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> into the <S%G290>vineyard,<s%> and <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> is <S%G1342>right<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> you.' And [so] they <S%G565>went.<s%>
<S%G3825>"Again<s%> he <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> and the <S%G7067>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> and <S%G4160>did<s%> the <S%G5615>same<s%> <S%G5615>thing.<s%>

"And <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G1734>eleventh<s%> [hour] he <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G2476>standing;<s%> and he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>'Why<s%> have you been <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G692>idle<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> long?'

"They <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3754>'Because<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G3409>hired<s%> us.' He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, 'You <S%G2532>too<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> into the <S%G290>vineyard.<s%>'

"And when <S%G3798>evening<s%> had <S%G1096>come,<s%> the <S%G2962>owner<s%> of the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to his <S%G2012>foreman,<s%> <S%G2564>'Call<s%> the <S%G2040>laborers<s%> and <S%G591>pay<s%> them their <S%G3408>wages,<s%> <S%G757>beginning<s%> with the <S%G2078>last<s%> [group] to the <S%G4413>first.<s%>'
"And when <S%G3588>those<s%> [hired] <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G1734>eleventh<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G303>each<s%> <S%G303>one<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> a <S%G1220>denarius.<s%>

"And when <S%G3588>those<s%> [hired] <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> they <S%G3543>thought<s%> that they would <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G4183>more;<s%> and they <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G303>each<s%> <S%G303>one<s%> a <S%G1220>denarius.<s%>
"And when they <S%G2983>received<s%> it, they <S%G1111>grumbled<s%> at the <S%G3617>landowner,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>'These<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2078>men<s%> have <S%G4160>worked<s%> [only] <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> and you have <S%G4160>made<s%> them <S%G2470>equal<s%> to us <S%G3588>who<s%> have <S%G941>borne<s%> the <S%G922>burden<s%> and the <S%G2742>scorching<s%> <S%G2742>heat<s%> of the <S%G2250>day.<s%>'

"But he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G1520>one<s%> of them, <S%G2083>'Friend,<s%> I am <S%G91>doing<s%> you <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G91>wrong;<s%> did you not <S%G4856>agree<s%> with me for a <S%G1220>denarius<s%>?

<S%G142>'Take<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> is <S%G4674>yours<s%> and <S%G5217>go<s%> your <S%G5217>way,<s%> but I <S%G2309>wish<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2078>man<s%> the <S%G2532>same<s%> as to you.

'Is it not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for me to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G2309>wish<s%> with <S%G3588>what<s%> is my <S%G1699>own<s%>? <S%G2228>Or<s%> is your <S%G3788>eye<s%> <S%G4190>envious<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G18>generous<s%>?'
<S%G3779>"Thus<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> shall be <S%G4413>first,<s%> and the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2078>last.<s%>"

And as <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G305>go<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> He <S%G3880>took<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> [disciples] aside by <S%G2398>themselves,<s%> and on the <S%G3598>way<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them,

<S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> we are <S%G305>going<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem;<s%> and the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> will be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> and they will <S%G2632>condemn<s%> Him to <S%G2288>death,<s%>

and will <S%G3860>deliver<s%> Him to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> to <S%G1702>mock<s%> and <S%G3146>scourge<s%> and <S%G4717>crucify<s%> [Him,] and on the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> He will be <S%G1453>raised<s%> up. "

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him with her <S%G5207>sons,<s%> <S%G4352>bowing<s%> <S%G4352>down,<s%> and <S%G154>making<s%> a <S%G154>request<s%> of Him.

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G5101>"What<s%> do you <S%G2309>wish<s%>?" She <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G3004>"Command<s%> that in Your <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G1473>mine<s%> may <S%G2523>sit,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> on Your <S%G1188>right<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> on Your <S%G2176>left.<s%>"

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "You do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you are <S%G154>asking<s%> for. Are you <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%> the <S%G4221>cup<s%> that I <S%G3195>am<s%> <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%>?" They <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "We are <S%G1410>able.<s%>"

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "My <S%G4221>cup<s%> you shall <S%G4095>drink;<s%> but to <S%G2523>sit<s%> on My <S%G1188>right<s%> and on [My] <S%G2176>left,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> is not <S%G1699>Mine<s%> to <S%G1325>give,<s%> but it is for those for <S%G3739>whom<s%> it has been <S%G2090>prepared<s%> by My <S%G3962>Father.<s%>"
And <S%G191>hearing<s%> [this,] the <S%G1176>ten<s%> became <S%G23>indignant<s%> with the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G80>brothers.<s%>

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> them to Himself, and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "You <S%G3609>know<s%> that the <S%G758>rulers<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2634>lord<s%> it <S%G2634>over<s%> them, and [their] <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3173>men<s%> <S%G2715>exercise<s%> <S%G2715>authority<s%> <S%G2715>over<s%> them.

" It is not <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, but <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G2309>wishes<s%> to <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you shall be your <S%G1249>servant,<s%>
and <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G2309>wishes<s%> to be <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you shall be your <S%G1401>slave;<s%>

<S%G5618>just<s%> as the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> did not <S%G2064>come<s%> to be <S%G1247>served,<s%> but to <S%G1247>serve,<s%> and to <S%G1325>give<s%> His <S%G5590>life<s%> a <S%G3083>ransom<s%> for <S%G4183>many.<s%> "
And as they were <S%G1607>going<s%> out from <S%G2410>Jericho,<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> Him.

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5185>men<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> by the <S%G3598>road,<s%> <S%G191>hearing<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G3855>passing<s%> by, <S%G2896>cried<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1653>have<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on us, <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G7035>David!<s%>"

And the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2008>sternly<s%> <S%G2008>told<s%> them to be <S%G4623>quiet;<s%> but they <S%G2896>cried<s%> out <S%G3173>all<s%> the <S%G3173>more,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1653>have<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on us, <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G7035>David!<s%>"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stopped<s%> and <S%G5455>called<s%> them, and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> do you <S%G2309>want<s%> Me to <S%G4160>do<s%> for you?"
They <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> [we want] our <S%G3788>eyes<s%> to be <S%G455>opened.<s%>"

And <S%G4697>moved<s%> with <S%G4697>compassion,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G681>touched<s%> their <S%G3659>eyes;<s%> and <S%G2112>immediately<s%> they <S%G308>regained<s%> their <S%G308>sight<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> Him.
